title: Whats with the lack of sivir skins?
body: Of all the champions in the game, i dont think anyone's skins are harder to acquire than sivir. why do this to us sivir fans? we just want to give you our money but you hold the skins in your "vaults" for what? its not right.

replies.body: The vaulted or unobtainable skins are in that position for exclusivity or to ensure that only the people who attended events like PAX have them. For instance, some PAX skins are only available if you had physically gone to PAX, because it was a special bonus for having been there. It doesn't feel right to later open those up for anyone.
